Based on your preferences for movies with a law theme and featuring star Chris Eigeman, I would recommend watching "The Law of Desire", which is directed by Chris Eigeman and features him alongside other notable actors such as Michael Imperioli, Esai Miranda, and David Arquette.
"The Law of Desire" follows the story of two brothers named Nick and Ryan who are trying to make ends meet in a struggling neighborhood.
One day, while Nick and Ryan are out searching for some extra cash, they stumble upon an old book titled "The Law of Desire".
The Law of Desire is the principle that governs all forms of desire, including sexual desire, emotional desire, and intellectual desire.
